427790.name: Crudelis - Original Soundtrack
427790.description:
The soundtrack of Crudelis is a trip to the deepest parts of your soul. With the help of cellos, violins and a piano, Richard Wurth created something that words can hardly describe: the sadness and grief, the mystery and anger. If you enjoyed the soundtrack, and you want to listen to it outside the game – this is just perfect for you!

The album consists of 5 original Crudelis tracks available in two formats: lossless FLAC and 320 kbps MP3.

Tracklist

  1. The Glass Palace Royale
  2. Stringing The Piano
  3. Endless Mystery
  4. The Clock is Ticking
  5. Tragedy

Where to find

After the download it can be found in the "OST" folder, inside the Crudelis directory.
Steam\steamapps\common\Crudelis\OST
